tags: None
review:
***** **** *** **** ************* * **** ** *** ****** She's very thorough, very efficient and her treatment has always worked for me. 

But the doctor herself was very approachable, somewhat thorough as well. Very open to hearing patients out. I am pretty finicky about trusting doctors, but I'm definitely going back for a second visit.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: In today's world if higher power is personified it will be in the form of a doctor and Dr. Bandana Sodhi is a live example of this. Despite COVID situation she has been committed to her profession whole heartedly. She is an exemplary gynecologist and a beautiful human being. During my 9 months of pregnancy , whenever I have called her,  despite her hectic schedule she has answered all my silly doubts and  busted all my myths with a smile on her face....she is very approachable and has exquisite knowledge of her field. She has been a guiding angel to me during stressful 9 months . She has taken utmost care to explain to me all the investigations and  procedures, their indications and benefits. Her utmost priority is the patient . Right from the start of pregnancy to the delivery of the baby she has taken care of the smallest details. I would highly recommend her to all the ladies looking for the best gynecologist in town....and yes she is super busy .***** ****** ******* *** ** *** **** *** *** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ******* ***** ** *** **** ******* ****** *** ***** ** ******* ** ***** ******  We’ve been visiting her in Moolchand Hospital from the start of the pregnancy journey. 

She has been so caring, considerate, have handled all our queries, potential situations, concerns so logically and making us understand all ramifications thereof. 

We have been always amazed at her ability to multi-task so many patients, but still be in touch with each patient’s minutest points of contention with the highest degree of precision and recall.

There was a particular condition for which we ran from pillar to posts across diagnostic centres, ultrasounds etc. Dr. Sodhi was able to exactly determine the situation with a physical inspection.  

Her level of sincerity towards her patients, to be able to help them on odd hours, or holidays is so sincerely appreciated. 

All we and our family have for Ma’am is just the deepest and sincerest sense of gratitude for the absolutely unbelievable service to society that she is doing. Thank You Ma’am again so much. Kindest Regards, Bhawna and Ashish and Baby Kohienur.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: As a single woman, it took me 6yrs to find a gynaecologist who was non-judgmental, thorough and prescribed medicines only because it was absolutely necessary. I kept changing my gynaecologist because my problem was pcos was not getting any better and I was put on OCP which gave me other problems as well until I met her. Suffered from PCOS for 6yrs with irregular periods, my periods were back to normal within the first three months of her treatment. It's almost been 3yrs since I have been going to her. Now I have regular periods without any medication, like I told you she will prescribe medicines only if necessary. Although I still have cysts, I'm in a much better place than I was 6yrs before. I absolutely admire and adore Dr. Sodhi, very lucky to have found her on Google while I was on a quest for a gynaecologist who actually cared without being judgemental, and so easy to talk to. I would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Not recommended at all.
I visited her during my pregnancy, she's super busy, keeping information to herself, huge wait time in clinic etc. And finally near to my delivery date she started pushing me for planning my pregnancy (means C section), ******* **** ***** **** ******* ***** *** * **** **** ******* **** ***** *** * ****** *********** *** ******** ***** ** ****** ** ****** ***** ****** ****** ** ******* ** *** ***** ** ****** *** **** * ****** ** **** **** ** ******** ***** she said I will not deliver on 2nd Oct as it's a public holiday (this is my actual delivery date known from beginning). So finally with this unprofessional behaviour I need to switch to another doctor 1 week before my delivery time

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** **** ******. As a patient I always feel calm and composed just with her presence. Initially she diagnosed the problem I was facing with conception and now she has been my gynae during pregnancy as well. She takes utmost care of her patients. Gives attention. Prescribes minimal medicines and procedures. I have had best experience with her and would strongly recommend everyone who is facing any issue in conceiving or during your pregnancy or any other gynae issues****** ** *** **** ****** ** ********. Thank you Dr. Sodhi for everything :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: After all most visiting 5 doctors we ended up meeting Dr Sodhi. We initially thought that because of AFMC she would be more caring and understanding and indeed she is more than that. I was 6 month pregnant when we meet the doctor, in the initial 6 months it was like 10 medicines a day all for different purpose but post meeting the doctor it was only about basic 2-3 medicines and I delivered a normal baby after even many complications. Would highly recommend the doctor and no need to take second opinion as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Okay, for us she was not less than a God. We had miscarriage in 2016 and was suffering from stress and a lot of depression. Our last doctor advised us to go for Infertility treatments but then one fine day we came across her *** ** *** ** *** **** ** *** ***** (after doing some research online)

We visited her (late 2017) and within couple of months she was successfully pregnant and on 20th June 2018 she has delivered a healthy baby boy at Moolchand hospital. All thanks to her who listened to us and suggested us the right path to parenthood.

tags: None
review: I am very pleased to visit Dr Bandana. She is very polite and very knowledgeable OBGYN Dr. I highly recommend her.

tags: None
review:
Dr Bandana Sodhi is a very caring *** ************* **************

I have taking my wife to her for some time now and always found her to be very empathetic and understanding to our problems. 

One thing I really appreciate about her is that despite having such a busy schedule and so many patients she is always well informed about our case and offers the right guidance and support. She is all ears to our endless list of questions always and answers each to our satisfaction.

She is a authority in her field and can’t thank her enough for all her support..

tags: None
review: Seeing the treatment and care my mother got under Dr Bandana Sodhi ma'am during her laparoscopic surgery and results afterwards and her so good behaviour with patients, I was so impressed that I called my maternal aunt from Bihar whose operation was scheduled in Patna and was facing the same problem as my mother to Dr Bandana ma'am so that she also can have the same painless and so caring treatment under her.  Again, she did fantastic job and made her feel very comfortable and fearless during whole procedure, heard her concerns with patience and gave her all the options with pros and cons. She always asks the opinion of patients too. A very kind hearted and sweet doctor she is. Immense respect for her and I will recommend her to everyone.  God bless you ma'am.

tags: None
review: Our experience was very good. Dr. Sodhi listens to you..she gives ample amount of time and doesn't seems to be rushing at all in comparison to the other doctors we met before her. Also, she is very approachable over the phone as well and the response time is amazing. This is our second pregnancy and the gap is almost 10 years. We were shocked to see that now almost all the doctors gives you a very strong feeling of being commercialised and are ready to send you back even before your consultation begins however meeting Dr. Sodhi was such a delight. Plus her knowledge is much better and advanced than many other doctors who would prescribe age old medicines and dosages. She's a must visit and we would recommend her to everyone. We are sure you would come back with a smile.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I wish I had the words to thank you for an amazing birth experience. The last 9 months have been so positive and exciting for my entire family. Every time I left after meeting you, I felt very confident that this birth would be very special. Whenever I felt anxious or afraid of all the unknowns, all I had to do was talk to you. Your confidence, positivity and genuinity made this journey a truly beautiful one.

Thank you so much for the remarkable care you gave me + baby R— on February 17th. It was perhaps the scariest moment of my life, but I could feel I was in very capable hands. You will never know how much that means to me. Thank you from the depths of my heart.

You’re extremely gifted and talented.

tags: Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: When I first visited with gf she didn't listen to her problem just started writing the medicines. Her receptionist charged me 1000 rupee instead of 900 . Second consultation, my appointment was at 7:30 but she asked me to wait, I waited till 8:30 . They first check patients who come without appointment. When I told her that i was charged extra, she told me to don't take appointment through practo and come directly as they charge 1000 rupees.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: One of the best decisions I have ever made was to consult Dr. Bandana for my pregnancy journey. She is a true professional when it comes to handling her cases, she has immense knowledge and experience. She listens to all the issues and questions very patiently and makes sure she answers the queries to the maximum satisfaction of her patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: ***  ** ***  ****  ******  ** **  ********** She  listen  all your  problems, so caring.... Two  years  back  when  I was  5 months  pregnant I visited Dr. Bandana sodhi.... She  tried  her  level  best  for my  normal  delivery.. I am  really  very  lucky  to have  Dr. Like  her  at  that  time... I also  recommend  my  three  friends  for  their  delivery.... And  their  experiences were  also  superb.....

Many thanks for everything doctor.

tags: None

And she is available all the time to help in case u need any advice. She also ensured that my normal delivery is safe and helped after my delivery too. 
Will definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

Also she is available all the time to help the patients on phone as well , in case u need any advice. She also ensured that we had a smooth surgery and had a comfortable stay at hospital. Will definitely recommend her.

review: i have been to to see dr. sodhi twice now. she is really friendly, kind and patient. often gynaecologists are very judgmental. but my experience with dr. sodhi was the complete opposite. i would recommend her to all single women who are sexually active.

We are fortunate to meet her and highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** ** * ********* ******* * ********* ******* *** ***** *** **** ****** ** **** * ***** ***** ************* ** ****** *** I wasn't at all disappointed. I definitely highly recommend the doctor. 
I had visited her for vaginal cyst treatment, by the way. She performed the surgery herself. I was very nervous in the operation theatre but she assured me so well. She has this really warm personality and she's very professional. I'm just a big fan of her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Very approachable doctor. I am writing this review based only on my first visit to her.  Later when I had certain confusion related to the suggested tests, she was available for clarification. I am visiting her again with my reports hoping for an equally great experience ahead.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Sodhi is very polite and well-spoken. She listens to every issue patiently. She is very precise and direct in her approach. She explains things in a lucid manner. She recommends a balanced mix of the right tests and minimal medicines (with just one medicine for now) for getting a clear and holistic picture. (I have to visit her again after fifteen days)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She gives you time and treats you with immense patience. She heeds to what we have to say and doesn’t miss a point which needs to be addressed by her. You already feel as if you have healed half way through when she let’s you know the course of medication and advises you of best practices. 
I plan to have babies in the near future and she would be my go to lady when the time comes. 
I hail her for simple and yet effective way of treatment. Thanks a ton!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The consultation experience was really good. Dr Bandana understood my concerns, did a thorough check, and explained her diagnosis pretty clearly. She was professional and friendly, and made me feel comfortable in sharing my issues, without any judgments. I would highly recommended consulting Dr Bandana for any questions or concerns you may have.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

I can recommend with confident that Dr Bandana Sodhi ** **** ************* for any kind of pregnancy treatment.

Whenever i meet her.I feel confidence.She is very caring to all her patients.
Thank you so much ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor was friendly and professional. She explained the health issues in a proper and lay-man language. The best part of going to her was that she was quick to diagnose the problem and the medicines *** **** *** ***** ********** I would recommend anyone who is going through health issues, she is super fast and super helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Sodhi is a friendly doc. It was our first appointment with her, and she came across as a genuine person. Professionally, she informed us thoroughly about all dos and don'ts. We have decided to continue the routine check-up with her and hope she would give best advice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She's the most passionate doctor i've found so far who not only calmed my health related anxiety but also gave me the right advice for the procedure. I am glad that i found her on time and i would definitely recommend her to any one facing gyno related issues. She always 
attends her patients above and beyond her call of duty. God bless her! 
-Arti N.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: You will find very few doctors who are alumni of prestigious institutions, have impressive resumes, are passionate, genuine, listen to patients actively, bring comprehensive solutions to the problems and are always available to patients. Dr. Bandana Sodhi is the fewest amongst those few. She is an alumni of AFMC Pune and has rich experience in Obstetrics & Gynaecology.Dr Bandana Sodhi has been the first and the last stop of everything related to Gyne issues since 2018. There was an instance when my wife had some issue. Other practitioners said She has to go through surgical procedure. However She brought her impressive education and rich experience to solve this problem without any surgery. She has also been our obstetrician to our first child which we have been recently blessed with.Ma'am, we can't thank you more! We remain indebted to you! May you remain a sunshine to all the people who seek help from you!!May you be blissful, healthy and live long!!!!Sincerely,

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited for fertility issues and was highly disappointed.. wasted so much time with her. She did not explained the problem and ******* ************* *** ***** ** ********** ********* ***** started the treatment that included large numbers of injections and medicines every month. This went on for 7-8 months *** *** ****** *** ** **** *** ****** ***** ****** *** ******* ** *** *********. I consulted another doctor *** ********** ****** **** ** ***** ********* ***** *** ********* ***** ****** ** ******** ****** * ****** I would not at all recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My wife had 2 miscarriage in past 4years and we had being in touch with almost 4 gynecologist but non of them was able to diagnose the route cause, thanks to my friend who has recommended Dr bandana mam and on 1st opd itself she understood our issue and started line of treatment and with all her support and guidance we are finally blessed with baby girl on april 23 .. thanks will be a small word to express our gratitude and regards for dr bandani mam.

Hard to find Highly professional dr.with personal and carying touch ..positive approach..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** ** *** **** **** *** *** *** When I planned for a baby, I visited many doctors in Noida. Neither the treatment was fruitful nor we were satisfied with the behavior with the doctor. Considering the biological age, many doctors even suggested to go dorectly for IVF without wasting any time. But we were not ready for that as we didn't even know, if at all there is any problem that I can't conceive naturally. 
Finally we met Mam. She is such a humble human being. Wherein other doctors in the first meeting made me realize that I am too late, Mam gave me hope that there is nothing to worry and everything is normal as per my reports. Finally within few months of treatment, I conceived under her treatment. I had healthiest of pregnancy and gave birth to a baby girl without any complications. 
Also to mention, whenever I had any problem, Mam was just a call/SMS away.

tags: None
review: She is a highly qualified, experienced and sweet doctor.  I went there for my mother's laparoscopic hysterectomy and she dealt with it very professionally. Her behaviour with the patients is so good that they feel very comfortable even in critical surgeries. She has one amazing habit of writing her personal mobile number on the prescription so that you can contact her in case of any abnormal situation and she makes sure that she replies. My mother had a very good experience in her care.

I am going to see the doctor again after 2 weeks with our sonography results

Half of your problems vanish when you have a doctor who can listen to you and try to understand your situation rather than imposter thoughts on you and your problems and Dr. Sodhi gives her best to listen to you.

review: Dr. Sodhi was extremely friendly and nice to consult health concerns with. However, I was a little put off by the wait time, as I was made to wait beyond  the time at which I set my appointment for. Overall, I recommend her as doctor, but keep your schedules a little flexible to accommodate potential delays.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Bandana is a warm and caring doctor. Her warmth makes the person comfortable. She is also able to reason her advice​ well, which resonates scientific assurance. Though I have only begun my treatment, I'm very positive that it will be successful.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Bandana is a very experienced doctor and understands the issue quickly. She explains everything nicely when asked. She is also very responsive on phone and messages. Whenever i had some health issue during my pregnancy, she responded quickly with the medicines required.
Avoid going on Saturdays due to rush and waiting time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: There are doctors and more doctors, but one longs for one who is friendly, smiling, exudes confidence, is certain of herself and comes across as a friend and a true professional. That is what Dr Bandana Sodhi is packaged as. One is assured of excellent advise and in absolute safe hands. One doesn't need a second opinion. God Bless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She makes you feel comfortable. It felt as if I was just discussing my problem with my own mum without hesitation and fear. She is in every sense true to her profession. It was my first visit to a gynae and all my anxiety was put to rest just with her lovely face and the calmness of her aura that she has.

tags: None
review: I really appreciate the way Doctor was so welcoming and made me understand each and everything. She was experienced and kind *** *** **** ************* ** **** *** ******* ***** ** ********* ***** It was a great experience to have a treatment from a doctor like Bandana Sodhi and I would recommend her to anyone who seeks medical help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Sodhi was seeing patients at a women’s clinic. It was crowded and I was the 15th patient in a long line of patients. Dr Sodhi saw each patient in her office, took care of their needs, then called the next person in. I wish I didn’t have to wait so long, but I don’t fault Dr. Sodhi. When it was my turn, she answered each of my many questions and attended to all my needs. Patient, kind, competent and service-oriented. I can see why she is popular.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
